0002ca  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0002cc  f7fffffe          BL       DROPDOWN_SetSel
;;;591    }
0002d0  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;592    
                          ENDP

                  DROPDOWN_IncSel PROC
;;;576    */
;;;577    void DROPDOWN_IncSel(DROPDOWN_Handle hObj) {
0002d2  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
0002d4  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;578      int Sel = DROPDOWN_GetSel(hObj);
0002d6  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0002d8  f7fffffe          BL       DROPDOWN_GetSel

;;;579      DROPDOWN_SetSel(hObj, Sel+1);
0002de  1c69              ADDS     r1,r5,#1
0002e0  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0002e2  f7fffffe          BL       DROPDOWN_SetSel
;;;580    }
0002e6  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;581    
                          ENDP

                  DROPDOWN_AddKey PROC
;;;530    */
;;;531    void DROPDOWN_AddKey(DROPDOWN_Handle hObj, int Key) {
0002e8  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
0002ea  4605              MOV      r5,r0
0002ec  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;532      if (hObj) {
0002ee  b18d              CBZ      r5,|L1.788|
;;;533        WM_LOCK();
;;;534        switch (Key) {
0002f0  2c11              CMP      r4,#0x11
0002f2  d005              BEQ      |L1.768|
0002f4  2c13              CMP      r4,#0x13
0002f6  d107              BNE      |L1.776|
;;;535          case GUI_KEY_DOWN:
;;;536            DROPDOWN_IncSel(hObj);
0002f8  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0002fa  f7fffffe          BL       DROPDOWN_IncSel
;;;537            break;
0002fe  e008              B        |L1.786|
                  |L1.768|
;;;538          case GUI_KEY_UP:
;;;539            DROPDOWN_DecSel(hObj);
000300  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000302  f7fffffe          BL       DROPDOWN_DecSel
;;;540            break;
000306  e004              B        |L1.786|
                  |L1.776|
;;;541          default:
;;;542            _SelectByKey(hObj, Key);
000308  4621              MOV      r1,r4
00030a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00030c  f7fffffe          BL       _SelectByKey
;;;543            break;
000310  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.786|
000312  bf00              NOP                            ;537
                  |L1.788|
;;;544        }
;;;545        WM_UNLOCK();
;;;546      }
;;;547    }
000314  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;548    
                          ENDP

                  DROPDOWN_Expand PROC
;;;468    */
;;;469    void DROPDOWN_Expand(DROPDOWN_Handle hObj) {

;;;471      WM_HWIN hLst;
;;;472      GUI_RECT r;

;;;475      DROPDOWN_Obj* pObj;
;;;476      if (hObj) {

000320  d072              BEQ      |L1.1032|
;;;477        WM_LOCK();
;;;478        pObj = DROPDOWN_H2P(hObj);

;;;479        if  (pObj->hListWin == 0) {

;;;480          hParent = WM_GetParent(hObj);

;;;482          xSize = WM__GetWindowSizeX(&pObj->Widget.Win);

;;;484          NumItems = DROPDOWN__GetNumItems(pObj);

;;;486          r = pObj->Widget.Win.Rect;

;;;487          GUI_MoveRect(&r, -pParent->Rect.x0, -pParent->Rect.y0);

000382  f8ad0016          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x16]

                  |L1.904|
;;;490          } else {
;;;491            r.y0 = r.y1;
000388  f8bd001a          LDRH     r0,[sp,#0x1a]

;;;492          }

00039a  e9cda700          STRD     r10,r7,[sp,#0]
00039e  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
0003a0  f9bd3016          LDRSH    r3,[sp,#0x16]

;;;498          if (pObj->Flags & DROPDOWN_SF_AUTOSCROLLBAR) {

                  DROPDOWN_Collapse PROC
;;;451    */
;;;452    void DROPDOWN_Collapse(DROPDOWN_Handle hObj) {

;;;453      DROPDOWN_Obj* pObj;
;;;454      if (hObj) {
000484  b16d              CBZ      r5,|L1.1186|
;;;455        WM_LOCK();
;;;456        pObj = DROPDOWN_H2P(hObj);

;;;457        if (pObj->hListWin) {

;;;458          WM_DeleteWindow(pObj->hListWin);

00049e  f8a40074          STRH     r0,[r4,#0x74]
                  |L1.1186|
;;;460        }
;;;461        WM_UNLOCK();
;;;462      }
;;;463    }
0004a2  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;464

                  DROPDOWN_Callback PROC
;;;324    */
;;;325    void DROPDOWN_Callback (WM_MESSAGE*pMsg) {
0004a4  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
0004a8  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;326      DROPDOWN_Handle hObj;
;;;327      DROPDOWN_Obj* pObj;
;;;328      char IsExpandedBeforeMsg;
;;;329      hObj = pMsg->hWin;
0004aa  f9b47004          LDRSH    r7,[r4,#4]
;;;330      pObj = (DROPDOWN_Obj *)GUI_ALLOC_h2p(hObj); /* Don't use use WIDGET_H2P because WIDGET_INIT_ID() has not be called at this point */
0004ae  4638              MOV      r0,r7
0004b0  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_h2p
0004b4  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;331      IsExpandedBeforeMsg = pObj->hListWin ? 1 : 0;
0004b6  f8b50074          LDRH     r0,[r5,#0x74]
0004ba  b108              CBZ      r0,|L1.1216|
0004bc  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0004be  e000              B        |L1.1218|
                  |L1.1216|
0004c0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.1218|
0004c2  4680              MOV      r8,r0
;;;332      /* Let widget handle the standard messages */
;;;333      if (WIDGET_HandleActive(hObj, pMsg) == 0) {
0004c4  4621              MOV      r1,r4
0004c6  4638              MOV      r0,r7
0004c8  f7fffffe          BL       WIDGET_HandleActive
0004cc  b908              CBNZ     r0,|L1.1234|
                  |L1.1230|
;;;334        return;
;;;335      }
;;;336      switch (pMsg->MsgId) {
;;;337      case WM_NOTIFY_OWNER_KEY:
;;;338        /* Close the listbox if DROPDOWN_KEY_SELECT has been pressed */
;;;339        if (((const WM_KEY_INFO*)(pMsg->Data.p))->PressedCnt > 0) {
;;;340          int Key;
;;;341          Key = ((const WM_KEY_INFO*)(pMsg->Data.p))->Key;
;;;342          if (Key == DROPDOWN_KEY_SELECT) {
;;;343            DROPDOWN_SetSel(hObj, LISTBOX_GetSel(pObj->hListWin));
;;;344            DROPDOWN_Collapse(hObj);
;;;345            WM_SetFocus(hObj);
;;;346          }
;;;347        }
;;;348        break;
;;;349      case WM_NOTIFY_PARENT:
;;;350        switch (pMsg->Data.v) {
;;;351        case WM_NOTIFICATION_SCROLL_CHANGED:
;;;352          WM_NotifyParent(hObj, WM_NOTIFICATION_SCROLL_CHANGED);
;;;353          break;
;;;354        case WM_NOTIFICATION_CLICKED:
;;;355          DROPDOWN_SetSel(hObj, LISTBOX_GetSel(pObj->hListWin));
;;;356          WM_SetFocus(hObj);
;;;357          break;
;;;358        case LISTBOX_NOTIFICATION_LOST_FOCUS:
;;;359          DROPDOWN_Collapse(hObj);
;;;360          break;
;;;361        }
;;;362        break;
;;;363      case WM_PID_STATE_CHANGED:
;;;364        if (IsExpandedBeforeMsg == 0) {    /* Make sure we do not react a second time */
;;;365          const WM_PID_STATE_CHANGED_INFO * pInfo = (const WM_PID_STATE_CHANGED_INFO*)pMsg->Data.p;
;;;366          if (pInfo->State) {
;;;367            DROPDOWN_Expand(hObj);
;;;368          }
;;;369        }
;;;370        break;
;;;371      case WM_TOUCH:
;;;372        if (_OnTouch(hObj, pMsg) == 0) {
;;;373          return;
;;;374        }
;;;375        break;
;;;376      case WM_PAINT:
;;;377        _Paint(hObj);
;;;378        break;
;;;379      case WM_DELETE:
;;;380        _FreeAttached(pObj);
;;;381        break;       /* No return here ... WM_DefaultProc needs to be called */
;;;382      case WM_KEY:
;;;383        if ( ((const WM_KEY_INFO*)(pMsg->Data.p))->PressedCnt >0) {
;;;384          int Key = ((const WM_KEY_INFO*)(pMsg->Data.p))->Key;
;;;385          switch (Key) {
;;;386            case DROPDOWN_KEY_EXPAND:
;;;387              DROPDOWN_Expand(hObj);
;;;388              break;
;;;389            case GUI_KEY_BACKTAB:
;;;390              break;
;;;391            case GUI_KEY_TAB:
;;;392              if (WM_GetFocussedWindow() == pObj->hListWin) {
;;;393                WM_SetFocus(hObj);      /* Make sure, WM_SetFocusOnNextChild() works right when calling WM_DefaultProc() */
;;;394              }
;;;395              break;                    /* Send to parent by not doing anything */
;;;396            default:
;;;397              DROPDOWN_AddKey(hObj, Key);
;;;398              return;
;;;399          }
;;;400        }
;;;401        break;
;;;402      }
;;;403      WM_DefaultProc(pMsg);
;;;404    }
0004ce  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
                  |L1.1234|
0004d2  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]            ;336
0004d4  280f              CMP      r0,#0xf               ;336
0004d6  d059              BEQ      |L1.1420|
0004d8  dc06              BGT      |L1.1256|

                  |L1.1256|

                  |L1.1270|

000510  4649              MOV      r1,r9                 ;343

                  |L1.1346|

000554  4638              MOV      r0,r7                 ;356

                  |L1.1372|

000562  bf00              NOP                            ;360

                  |L1.1384|

00056e  68a6              LDR      r6,[r4,#8]            ;365

000572  b110              CBZ      r0,|L1.1402|
000574  4638              MOV      r0,r7                 ;367

                  |L1.1402|

                  DROPDOWN_CreateEx PROC
;;;415    */
;;;416    DROPDOWN_Handle DROPDOWN_CreateEx(int x0, int y0, int xsize, int ysize, WM_HWIN hParent,

;;;417                                      int WinFlags, int ExFlags, int Id)
;;;418    {
0005f2  b085              SUB      sp,sp,#0x14
0005f4  4607              MOV      r7,r0
0005f6  4688              MOV      r8,r1
0005f8  461d              MOV      r5,r3
0005fa  e9ddab13          LDRD     r10,r11,[sp,#0x4c]
0005fe  f8dd9048          LDR      r9,[sp,#0x48]
;;;419      DROPDOWN_Handle hObj;
;;;420      WM_LOCK();
;;;421      hObj = WM_CreateWindowAsChild(x0, y0, xsize, -1, hParent, WinFlags, DROPDOWN_Callback,
000602  215c              MOVS     r1,#0x5c
000604  f2af1263          ADR      r2,DROPDOWN_Callback + 1
000608  fa1ff08a          UXTH     r0,r10
00060c  f04f33ff          MOV      r3,#0xffffffff
000610  e9cd9000          STRD     r9,r0,[sp,#0]
000614  e9cd2102          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#8]
000618  4641              MOV      r1,r8
00061a  4638              MOV      r0,r7
00061c  9a07              LDR      r2,[sp,#0x1c]
00061e  f7fffffe          BL       WM_CreateWindowAsChild
000622  4606              MOV      r6,r0
;;;422                                    sizeof(DROPDOWN_Obj) - sizeof(WM_Obj));
;;;423      if (hObj) {
000624  b1d6              CBZ      r6,|L1.1628|
;;;424        DROPDOWN_Obj* pObj;
;;;425        pObj = (DROPDOWN_Obj *)GUI_ALLOC_h2p(hObj); /* Don't use use WIDGET_H2P because WIDGET_INIT_ID() has not be called at this point */
000626  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000628  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_h2p
00062c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;426        /* Init sub-classes */
;;;427        GUI_ARRAY_CREATE(&pObj->Handles);
;;;428        /* init widget specific variables */
;;;429        WIDGET__Init(&pObj->Widget, Id, WIDGET_STATE_FOCUSSABLE);

000634  f7fffffe          BL       WIDGET__Init

;;;431        pObj->Props          = DROPDOWN__DefaultProps;

00063e  4909              LDR      r1,|L1.1636|
000640  f1040040          ADD      r0,r4,#0x40
000644  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy4
;;;432        pObj->ScrollbarWidth = 0;
000648  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00064a  f884007a          STRB     r0,[r4,#0x7a]
;;;433        DROPDOWN_INIT_ID(pObj);
;;;434        pObj->ySizeEx = ysize;
00064e  b228              SXTH     r0,r5
000650  8560              STRH     r0,[r4,#0x2a]
;;;435        DROPDOWN__AdjustHeight(hObj, pObj);

000654  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000656  f7fffffe          BL       DROPDOWN__AdjustHeight
;;;436      }
00065a  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1628|
;;;437      WM_UNLOCK();

00065c  4630              MOV      r0,r6
;;;439    }
00065e  b009              ADD      sp,sp,#0x24
000660  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
;;;440

                  |L1.1636|
                          DCD      DROPDOWN__DefaultProps

                          AREA ||.data||, DATA, ALIGN=2

                  DROPDOWN__DefaultProps
                          DCD      GUI_Font13_1
                          DCD      0x00ffffff
                          DCD      0x00808080
                          DCD      0x00ff0000
                          DCD      0x00000000
                          DCD      0x00ffffff

                          DCD      0x00000000

                          DCD      0x0fffffff
